active_incidents.title: Outbound emails are failing to send

notes.body:
We appreciate your patience while we continue to address these issues.

We're also continuing to investigate file download failures, although this is only expected to impact a small number of users.

We are still working to address the issues with outbound email failures.
A small number of file downloads may be failing, this remains part of our investigation.

We are continuing to look into reports of outbound email failures. If you're awaiting a confirmation code for login, manually signing in with email address and password will work in the interim. 

We're also monitoring issues with downloading files.
We're investigating failures in sending outbound emails including invitations, confirmation codes for workspace creation, email notifications.
